text.title: Thermodynamic Properties of Aqueous Sodium Chloride Solutions
text.authors: Kenneth S. Pitzer, J. Christopher Peiper, and R. H. Busey
text.venue: Journal of Physical and Chemical Reference Data 13, 1

tables.name: Standard G
tables.description: Standard Gibbs energies. Debye-Huckel A_phi parameter, and virial coefficients for NaCl(aq)

tables.name: Standard S
tables.description: Standard entropies, Debye-Huckel A_s parameter, and virial coefficients for the NaCl(aq) entropy

tables.name: Standard H
tables.description: Standard enthalpies, Debye-Huckel A_L parameter and virial coefficients for the NaCl(aq) enthalpy

tables.name: Standard Cp
tables.description: Standard heat capacities, Debye-Huckel A_J parameter, and virial coefficients for the NaCl(aq) heat capacity

tables.name: Standard Volume
tables.description: Standard volumes, Debye-Huckel A_v parameter, and virial coefficients for the NaCl(aq) volume

tables.name: Standard Expansivity
tables.description: Standard expansivities, Debye-Huckel A_x parameter, and virial coefficients for the NaCl(aq) expansivity

tables.name: Standard Compressibility
tables.description: Standard compressibilities, Debye-Huckel A_K parameter, and virial coefficients for the NaCl(aq) compressibility
